ai-thag4.5:1.4_0: I shaved off my hair and beard,
ai-thag4.5:3.1_0: I did many deeds of this kind,
ai-thag4.5:3.2_0: that lead to a bad destination.
ai-thag4.5:3.3_0: Swept away in a great flood,
ai-thag4.5:3.4_0: I went to the Buddha for refuge.
ai-thag4.5:4.2_0: see the excellence of the teaching!”
ai-thag4.5:4.4_0: and have fulfilled the Buddha’s instructions.
